title: Return Shipping Labels and Process
content: Return labels are provided via email after initiating a return. Print the label and attach it to your package. Drop off at any carrier location or schedule a pickup.

title: Return Condition Requirements
content: Items must be in original condition with tags attached and original packaging. Used items may be subject to restocking fees. Custom items cannot be returned.

title: Return Authorization Numbers
content: Each return gets a unique authorization number. Include this number on your return package and keep it for tracking. Contact support if you need a new authorization number.

title: Return Processing Timeline
content: Returns are processed within 3-5 business days after we receive them. You'll receive an email confirmation when your return is processed and refund issued.

title: Restocking Fees and Charges
content: Restocking fees may apply to certain items or return reasons. Fees are clearly stated during the return process. No fees for defective items or our errors.

title: International Returns and Exchanges
content: International returns must be shipped back to us at customer expense. Refunds are processed in the original payment currency. Contact us for international return instructions.

title: Return Tracking and Status
content: Track your return using the tracking number on your return label. Check return status in your account or contact support for updates on return processing.

title: Exchange vs Return Process
content: Exchanges are processed as a return and new purchase. You'll receive the new item once we process your return. Exchanges may take longer than direct returns.

title: Return Policy Exceptions
content: Some items have different return policies. Check product pages for specific return terms. Final sale items, custom orders, and intimate items cannot be returned.

title: Return Refund Methods
content: Refunds are issued to the original payment method. Credit card refunds may take 1-2 billing cycles. PayPal refunds are usually instant. Gift card purchases are refunded as store credit.

title: Account Security and Privacy
content: Your account is protected with industry-standard security. We never share your personal information. Use strong passwords and enable two-factor authentication when available.

title: Account Deletion and Data Removal
content: You can delete your account in account settings. This removes your personal data but preserves order history for tax purposes. Contact support for complete data removal requests.

title: Email Preferences and Notifications
content: Manage email preferences in your account settings. Choose which notifications you want to receive. You can unsubscribe from marketing emails while keeping order notifications.

title: Account Verification and Identity
content: We may request identity verification for high-value orders or security purposes. This helps protect your account and prevent fraud. Verification is quick and secure.

title: Multiple Account Management
content: Each person should have their own account. Multiple accounts for the same person may be merged or suspended. Contact support if you have multiple accounts that need to be combined.

title: Account Recovery and Access
content: If you can't access your account, use the 'Forgot Password' feature. If that doesn't work, contact support with your email address and we'll help you regain access.

title: Profile Information Updates
content: Keep your profile information current for accurate shipping and billing. Update your name, address, and contact information as needed. Changes are saved immediately.

title: Account Activity and Login History
content: View your account activity and login history in account settings. This helps you monitor account security and identify any unauthorized access.

title: Sticker Design and Customization
content: We offer custom sticker designs for bulk orders. Submit your design requirements and we'll create custom stickers for your business or organization.

title: Sticker Material and Quality
content: Our stickers are made from high-quality vinyl with UV protection and weather resistance. They're designed to last outdoors and maintain their color and adhesion.

title: Sticker Size Options and Specifications
content: We offer various sticker sizes from small 1-inch designs to large 6-inch stickers. Custom sizes available for bulk orders. Check product pages for exact dimensions.

title: Sticker Application Surfaces
content: Our stickers work on most smooth surfaces including metal, plastic, glass, and painted surfaces. Avoid rough or porous surfaces for best results. Clean surfaces before application.

title: Sticker Care and Maintenance
content: Clean stickers with mild soap and water. Avoid harsh chemicals or abrasive cleaners. Stickers are designed to be low-maintenance and long-lasting.

title: Sticker Storage and Handling
content: Store stickers in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. Keep them flat to prevent curling. Handle with clean hands to avoid transferring oils.

title: Sticker Bulk Orders and Pricing
content: Bulk sticker orders receive volume discounts. Contact us for custom pricing on orders over 100 stickers. We offer competitive rates for large quantities.

title: Sticker Shipping and Packaging
content: Stickers are shipped in protective packaging to prevent damage. Individual stickers come in backing sheets. Bulk orders are packaged securely for safe delivery.

title: Sticker Artwork and File Requirements
content: For custom stickers, submit artwork in high-resolution format (300 DPI minimum). We accept AI, EPS, PDF, and PNG files. Vector files preferred for best quality.

title: Wholesale Account Benefits
content: Wholesale accounts receive exclusive pricing, dedicated support, custom branding options, and priority processing. Volume discounts increase with order size.

title: Wholesale Application Requirements
content: Wholesale applications require business license, tax ID, and expected order volume. We review applications within 1-3 business days and may request additional documentation.

title: Wholesale Pricing Tiers and Discounts
content: Wholesale pricing has multiple tiers based on order volume. Discounts range from 10% to 40% off retail prices. Higher volumes receive better pricing.
